stats.ranker: Rank  This is a count of the rows from top to bottom. It is recalculated following the sorting of a column.
stats.position: Position most commonly played by the player GK - Goalkeepers DF - Defenders MF - Midfielders FW - Forwards FB - Fullbacks LB - Left Backs RB - Right Backs CB - Center Backs DM - Defensive Midfielders CM - Central Midfielders LM - Left Midfielders RM - Right Midfielders WM - Wide Midfielders LW - Left Wingers RW - Right Wingers AM - Attacking Midfielders
stats.age: Current age  Age at season start Given on August 1 for winter leagues and February 1 for summer leagues.
stats.games: Matches Played by the player or squad
stats.games_starts: Game or games started by player
stats.goals_per90: Goals Scored per 90 minutes Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
stats.assists_per90: Assists per 90 minutes Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
stats.goals_assists_per90: Goals and Assists per 90 minutes Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
stats.goals_pens_per90: Goals minus Penalty Kicks made per 90 minutes Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
stats.goals_assists_pens_per90: Goals plus Assists minus Penalty Kicks made per 90 minutes Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
stats.xg: Expected Goals xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted). Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
stats.npxg: Non-Penalty Expected Goals  Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
stats.xg_assist: Expected Assisted Goals  xG which follows a pass that assists a shot Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
stats.npxg_xg_assist: Non-Penalty Expected Goals plus Assisted Goals xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted). Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
stats.xg_per90: Expected Goals per 90 minutes xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted). Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
stats.xg_assist_per90: Expected Assisted Goals per 90 minutes Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
stats.xg_xg_assist_per90: Expected Goals plus Assisted Goals per 90 minutes xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted). Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
stats.npxg_per90: Non-Penalty Expected Goals per 90 minutes Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
stats.npxg_xg_assist_per90: Non-Penalty Expected Goals plus Assisted Goals per 90 minutes Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader

keepers.ranker: Rank  This is a count of the rows from top to bottom. It is recalculated following the sorting of a column.
keepers.position: Position most commonly played by the player GK - Goalkeepers DF - Defenders MF - Midfielders FW - Forwards FB - Fullbacks LB - Left Backs RB - Right Backs CB - Center Backs DM - Defensive Midfielders CM - Central Midfielders LM - Left Midfielders RM - Right Midfielders WM - Wide Midfielders LW - Left Wingers RW - Right Wingers AM - Attacking Midfielders
keepers.age: Current age  Age at season start Given on August 1 for winter leagues and February 1 for summer leagues.
keepers.gk_games: Matches Played by the player or squad
keepers.gk_games_starts: Game or games started by player
keepers.gk_save_pct: Save Percentage (Shots on Target Against - Goals Against)/Shots on Target Against Note that not all shots on target are stopped by the keeper, many will be stopped by defenders Does not include penalty kicks
keepers.gk_clean_sheets: Clean Sheets Full matches by goalkeeper where no goals are allowed.
keepers.gk_clean_sheets_pct: Clean Sheet Percentage Percentage of matches that result in clean sheets.
keepers.gk_pens_save_pct: Penalty Save Percentage Penalty Kick Goals Against/Penalty Kick Attempts Penalty shots that miss the target are not included

shooting.ranker: Rank  This is a count of the rows from top to bottom. It is recalculated following the sorting of a column.
shooting.position: Position most commonly played by the player GK - Goalkeepers DF - Defenders MF - Midfielders FW - Forwards FB - Fullbacks LB - Left Backs RB - Right Backs CB - Center Backs DM - Defensive Midfielders CM - Central Midfielders LM - Left Midfielders RM - Right Midfielders WM - Wide Midfielders LW - Left Wingers RW - Right Wingers AM - Attacking Midfielders
shooting.age: Current age  Age at season start Given on August 1 for winter leagues and February 1 for summer leagues.
shooting.shots: Shots Total Does not include penalty kicks
shooting.shots_on_target: Shots on target Note: Shots on target do not include penalty kicks
shooting.shots_on_target_pct: Percentage of shots that are on target Minimum .395 shots per squad game to qualify as a leader Note: Shots on target do not include penalty kicks
shooting.shots_per90: Shots total per 90 minutes Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
shooting.shots_on_target_per90: Shots on target per 90 minutes Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader Note: Shots on target do not include penalty kicks
shooting.goals_per_shot: Goals per shot Minimum .395 shots per squad game to qualify as a leader
shooting.goals_per_shot_on_target: Goals per shot on target Minimum .111 shots on target per squad game to qualify as a leader Note: Shots on target do not include penalty kicks
shooting.average_shot_distance: Average distance, in yards, from goal of all shots taken Minimum .395 shots per squad game to qualify as a leader Does not include penalty kicks
shooting.xg: Expected Goals xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted). Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
shooting.npxg: Non-Penalty Expected Goals  Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
shooting.npxg_per_shot: Non-Penalty Expected Goals per shot Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available. Minimum .395 shots per squad game to qualify as a leader
shooting.xg_net: Goals minus Expected Goals  xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted). Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
shooting.npxg_net: Non-Penalty Goals minus Non-Penalty Expected Goals  xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted). Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.

passing.ranker: Rank  This is a count of the rows from top to bottom. It is recalculated following the sorting of a column.
passing.position: Position most commonly played by the player GK - Goalkeepers DF - Defenders MF - Midfielders FW - Forwards FB - Fullbacks LB - Left Backs RB - Right Backs CB - Center Backs DM - Defensive Midfielders CM - Central Midfielders LM - Left Midfielders RM - Right Midfielders WM - Wide Midfielders LW - Left Wingers RW - Right Wingers AM - Attacking Midfielders
passing.age: Current age  Age at season start Given on August 1 for winter leagues and February 1 for summer leagues.
passing.passes_pct: Pass Completion Percentage Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
passing.passes_total_distance: Total distance, in yards, that completed passes have traveled in any direction
passing.passes_progressive_distance: Progressive Distance Total distance, in yards, that completed passes have traveled towards the opponent's goal. Note: Passes away from opponent's goal are counted as zero progressive yards.
passing.passes_completed_short: Passes Completed Passes between 5 and 15 yards
passing.passes_short: Passes Attempted Passes between 5 and 15 yards
passing.passes_pct_short: Pass Completion Percentage Passes between 5 and 15 yards Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
passing.passes_completed_medium: Passes Completed Passes between 15 and 30 yards
passing.passes_medium: Passes Attempted Passes between 15 and 30 yards
passing.passes_pct_medium: Pass Completion Percentage Passes between 15 and 30 yards Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
passing.passes_completed_long: Passes Completed Passes longer than 30 yards
passing.passes_long: Passes Attempted Passes longer than 30 yards
passing.passes_pct_long: Pass Completion Percentage Passes longer than 30 yards Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
passing.xg_assist: Expected Assisted Goals  xG which follows a pass that assists a shot Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
passing.pass_xa: Expected Assists  The likelihood each completed pass becomes a goal assists given the pass type, phase of play, location and distance. Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
passing.xg_assist_net: Assists minus Expected Goals Assisted  Provided by Opta. An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
passing.assisted_shots: Passes that directly lead to a shot (assisted shots)
passing.passes_into_final_third: Completed passes that enter the 1/3 of the pitch closest to the goal Not including set pieces
passing.passes_into_penalty_area: Completed passes into the 18-yard box Not including set pieces
passing.crosses_into_penalty_area: Completed crosses into the 18-yard box Not including set pieces
passing.progressive_passes: Progressive Passes Completed passes that move the ball towards the opponent's goal at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any completed pass into the penalty area. Excludes passes from the defending 40% of the pitch

defense.ranker: Rank  This is a count of the rows from top to bottom. It is recalculated following the sorting of a column.
defense.position: Position most commonly played by the player GK - Goalkeepers DF - Defenders MF - Midfielders FW - Forwards FB - Fullbacks LB - Left Backs RB - Right Backs CB - Center Backs DM - Defensive Midfielders CM - Central Midfielders LM - Left Midfielders RM - Right Midfielders WM - Wide Midfielders LW - Left Wingers RW - Right Wingers AM - Attacking Midfielders
defense.age: Current age  Age at season start Given on August 1 for winter leagues and February 1 for summer leagues.
defense.tackles_won: Tackles in which the tackler's team won possession of the ball
defense.dribbles_vs: Number of times dribbled past plus number of tackles
defense.dribble_tackles_pct: Percentage of dribblers tackled  Dribblers tackled divided by dribblers tackled plus times dribbled past Minimum .625 dribblers contested per squad game to qualify as a leader
defense.dribbled_past: Number of times dribbled past by an opposing player
defense.blocks: Number of times blocking the ball by standing in its path
defense.blocked_shots: Number of times blocking a shot by standing in its path
defense.blocked_passes: Number of times blocking a pass by standing in its path
defense.tackles_interceptions: Number of players tackled plus number of interceptions
defense.errors: Mistakes leading to an opponent's shot

possession.ranker: Rank  This is a count of the rows from top to bottom. It is recalculated following the sorting of a column.
possession.position: Position most commonly played by the player GK - Goalkeepers DF - Defenders MF - Midfielders FW - Forwards FB - Fullbacks LB - Left Backs RB - Right Backs CB - Center Backs DM - Defensive Midfielders CM - Central Midfielders LM - Left Midfielders RM - Right Midfielders WM - Wide Midfielders LW - Left Wingers RW - Right Wingers AM - Attacking Midfielders
possession.age: Current age  Age at season start Given on August 1 for winter leagues and February 1 for summer leagues.
possession.touches: Number of times a player touched the ball. Note: Receiving a pass, then dribbling, then sending a pass counts as one touch
possession.touches_live_ball: Live-ball touches. Does not include corner kicks, free kicks, throw-ins, kick-offs, goal kicks or penalty kicks
possession.dribbles_completed_pct: Percentage of Dribbles Completed Successfully Minimum .5 dribbles per squad game to qualify as a leader
possession.miscontrols: Number of times a player failed when attempting to gain control of a ball
possession.dispossessed: Number of times a player loses control of the ball after being tackled by an opposing player. Does not include attempted dribbles
possession.passes_received: Number of times a player successfully received a pass
possession.progressive_passes_received: Progressive Passes Received Completed passes that move the ball towards the opponent's goal at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any completed pass into the penalty area. Excludes passes from the defending 40% of the pitch

misc.ranker: Rank  This is a count of the rows from top to bottom. It is recalculated following the sorting of a column.
misc.position: Position most commonly played by the player GK - Goalkeepers DF - Defenders MF - Midfielders FW - Forwards FB - Fullbacks LB - Left Backs RB - Right Backs CB - Center Backs DM - Defensive Midfielders CM - Central Midfielders LM - Left Midfielders RM - Right Midfielders WM - Wide Midfielders LW - Left Wingers RW - Right Wingers AM - Attacking Midfielders
misc.age: Current age  Age at season start Given on August 1 for winter leagues and February 1 for summer leagues.
misc.tackles_won: Tackles in which the tackler's team won possession of the ball
misc.aerials_won_pct: Percentage of aerials won Minimum .97 aerial duels per squad game to qualify as a leader
